text: Joseph-Henri Lasserre (25 February 1828 – 22 July 1900) de Monzie is a French Catholic journalist and writer. He married Aurélie-Clémence Vasseur on September 8, 1868, with whom he had a daughter, Marie Marthe Lasserre de Monzie, wife of Abbadie d'Arrast, author of several biographies, news under the pseudonym of Henriaur.https://www.idref.fr/033567719 ==References== Category:French journalists Category:Writers from Nouvelle-Aquitaine Category:1828 births Category:1900 deaths Category:People from Dordogne
title: Henri Lasserre
